General.Name: Beijing Sifang Automation Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Sifang Automation Co.,Ltd supplies power transmission, transformation protection, automation systems, power generation, enterprise power, and power distribution and consumption systems in China and internationally. It offers power generation and utilization solutions, such as fossil fuel power plant automation, generator excitation, SSO/SSR protection and control, power generation simulation, PV and wind power automation, micro-grid automation, and hydropower plant automation solutions. The company also provides substation management and simulation, digital substation and power grid protection, energy management system, wide area measurement, and protection and fault information management system solutions; distribution automation solutions; and power supply, SVG power quality, and low voltage ride through solutions. In addition, it offers railway/metro, petroleum and petrochemical, and steel metallurgical power automation solutions; industrial automation control, enterprise power grid and refinery enterprise isolated operation, enterprise power grid dispatching and centralized, and multi-energy complementary and stable power supply solutions. Further, the company provides system installation, engineering, and other services. Beijing Sifang Automation Co.,Ltd was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Shangdi Information Industry Base, Beijing, China, 100085
